Static and Stars

───── a photography gallery ─────

About Me

Lily is an avid photographer and technology fanatic. She is currently in her second year at Dalhousie University studying computer science. She is the proud mother of 2 beautiful cats, Kitty and Ru. Lily specializes in urban and street photography as well as cosplay and fashion photography. She spends most of her time in various coffee shops around Halifax and Vancouver as well as listening to records on her giant pink record player. Lily is always happy to take photos and will gladly respond to any photoshoot requests.

Contact

For info, booking, or to request photos from a shoot, please email me at
staticandstarsphotography@gmail.com
or check out cosplr.com/staticandstars.
